description: Comprehensive currency trading and order management system with real-time inventory tracking, multi-game support (Path of Exile 1&2, Diablo 4), and supplier management
rules: Currency system uses Supabase as backend
Order workflow: sell orders, purchase orders, fulfillment
Authentication and authorization using Supabase Auth
File uploads use Supabase Storage work-proofs bucket
Database migrations follow naming convention with timestamps
Components use Naive UI for consistent design
Business logic in composables following Vue 3 patterns

mainFeatures: File upload system for proof images
dataFlow: User creates order → calls create_currency_*_order RPC function
RPC function validates inventory availability → reserves stock → creates order record
Database triggers automatically update currency_inventory on transaction insert/update
Inventory is tracked per game/league/currency/account/channel with reserved/available quantities
File uploads to Supabase Storage work-proofs bucket with public URLs stored in database
Game accounts are linked to suppliers and used for order fulfillment

importantPatterns.database: Uses RPC functions for complex operations, RLS for security
importantPatterns.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom component styles
